title.abbrev: Groupings for QUIC clients and servers

front.title: YANG Groupings for QUIC clients and QUIC servers

note.title: Editorial note (To be removed by the RFC Editor)
note.t: This draft contains placeholder values that need to be replaced with finalized values at the time of publication. This note summarizes all of the substitutions that are needed. No other RFC Editor instructions are specified elsewhere in this document.

Artwork in this document contains shorthand references to drafts in progress. Please apply the following replacements:
AAAA --> the assigned RFC value for this draft BBBB --> the assigned RFC value for draft-ietf-netconf-tls-client-server CCCC --> the assigned RFC value for draft-ietf-netconf-udp-client-server

section.title: Introduction
section.t: This documents defines two YANG 1.1 modules to support the configuration of QUIC clients and QUIC servers (QUIC is defined in ), either as standalone or in conjunction with configuration of other protocol layers.

section.title: The "ietf-quic-client" Module
section.t: This section defines a YANG 1.1 module called "ietf-quic-client".

section.title: YANG Module
section.t: This YANG module has normative references to and .

section.title: The "ietf-quic-server" Module
section.t: This section defines a YANG 1.1 module called "ietf-quic-server".

section.title: YANG Module
section.t: This YANG module has normative references to and .

section.title: The "IETF XML" Registry
section.t: This document registers one URI in the "ns" subregistry of the IETF XML Registry maintained at . Following the format in , the following registration is requested:

figure.artwork:
URI: urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-quic-client Registrant Contact: The IESG. XML: N/A, the requested URI is an XML namespace.
URI: urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-quic-server Registrant Contact: The IESG. XML: N/A, the requested URI is an XML namespace.

section.title: The "YANG Module Names" Registry
section.t: This document registers one YANG module in the YANG Module Names registry maintained at . Following the format defined in , the below registration is requested:

figure.artwork:
name: ietf-quic-client namespace: urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-quic-client prefix: quicc RFC: AAAA
name: ietf-quic-server namespace: urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-quic-server prefix: quics RFC: AAAA
